section.title: February 23, 2005 - MyFaces is Now a Top Level Apache Project

note.label: Email to myfaces-dev from ASF Board

section.note:
Hi All,
Congratulations to all for officially making MyFaces into a top level Apache project!
For the last couple of years, I believe the project has come a long way from its small beginnings. All of this is thanks to the contribution of every one of you, regardless of how large or small. Open source development, coupled with strong leadership (Manfred and others), is always a winning combination!
Once again, Congratulations.
Anton
